name: Cryptogcoin
description: The aim of Charity Alfa is to provide a charity system to the world, which is based on the modern tehcnology called blockchain, and connect the needy with donators and investors. We would like to ensure that the investors make a profitable donation so that it will be attractive for them to donate regurarly. To give a tool that brings to life a new concept, called the Investment Charity based on the CRG Token.
